verses.verse: בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> old עֶשְׂרִ֨ים <S%H6242><s%> [was] twenty וְחָמֵ֤שׁ <S%H2568><s%> and five שָׁנָה֙ <S%H8141><s%> years יוֹתָ֣ם <S%H3147><s%> Jotham בְּמָלְכ֔וֹ <S%H4427><s%> when he began to reign וְשֵׁשׁ־ <S%H8337><s%> six עֶשְׂרֵ֣ה <S%H6240><s%> teen שָׁנָ֔ה <S%H8141><s%> years מָלַ֖ךְ <S%H4427><s%> and he reigned בִּֽירוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> in Jerusalem וְשֵׁ֣ם <S%H8034><s%> name אִמּ֔וֹ <S%H517><s%> His mother's יְרוּשָׁ֖ה <S%H3388><s%> also [was] Jerushah בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> the daughter צָדֽוֹק׃ <S%H6659><s%> of Zadok

וַיַּ֨עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> And he did הַיָּשָׁ֜ר <S%H3477><s%> [that which was] right בְּעֵינֵ֣י <S%H5869><s%> in the sight יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD כְּכֹ֤ל <S%H3605><s%> to all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after עָשָׂה֙ <S%H6213><s%> did עֻזִּיָּ֣הוּ <S%H5818><s%> Uzziah אָבִ֔יו <S%H1><s%> according to all that his father רַ֕ק <S%H7535><s%> but לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not בָ֖א <S%H935><s%> howbeit he entered אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about הֵיכַ֣ל <S%H1964><s%> not into the temple יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וְע֥וֹד <S%H5750><s%> continued הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> And the people מַשְׁחִיתִֽים׃ <S%H7843><s%> did yet corruptly

ה֗וּא <S%H1931><s%> He בָּנָ֛ה <S%H1129><s%> He built אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שַׁ֥עַר <S%H8179><s%> gate בֵּית־ <S%H1004><s%> of the house יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD הָעֶלְי֑וֹן <S%H5945><s%> the high וּבְחוֹמַ֥ת <S%H2346><s%> and on the wall הָעֹ֛פֶל <S%H6077><s%> of Ophel בָּנָ֖ה <S%H1129><s%> he built לָרֹֽב׃ <S%H7230><s%> much

וְעָרִ֥ים <S%H5892><s%> cities בָּנָ֖ה <S%H1129><s%> Moreover he built בְּהַר־ <S%H2022><s%> in the mountains יְהוּדָ֑ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah וּבֶחֳרָשִׁ֣ים <S%H2793><s%> and in the forests בָּנָ֔ה <S%H1129><s%> he built בִּֽירָנִיּ֖וֹת <S%H1003><s%> castles וּמִגְדָּלִֽים׃ <S%H4026><s%> and towers

וְ֠הוּא <S%H1931><s%> He נִלְחַ֞ם <S%H3898><s%> He fought עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> also with the king בְּנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> against them And the children עַמּוֹן֮ <S%H5983><s%> of Ammon וַיֶּחֱזַ֣ק <S%H2388><s%> and prevailed עֲלֵיהֶם֒ <S%H5921><s%> over וַיִּתְּנוּ־ <S%H5414><s%> gave ל֨וֹ בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> So much did the children עַמּ֜וֹן <S%H5983><s%> of Ammon בַּשָּׁנָ֣ה <S%H8141><s%> him the same year הַהִ֗יא <S%H1931><s%> one מֵאָה֙ <S%H3967><s%> an hundred כִּכַּר־ <S%H3603><s%> talents כֶּ֔סֶף <S%H3701><s%> of silver וַעֲשֶׂ֨רֶת <S%H6235><s%> and ten אֲלָפִ֤ים <S%H505><s%> thousand כֹּרִים֙ <S%H3734><s%> measures חִטִּ֔ים <S%H2406><s%> of wheat וּשְׂעוֹרִ֖ים <S%H8184><s%> of barley עֲשֶׂ֣רֶת <S%H6235><s%> and ten אֲלָפִ֑ים <S%H505><s%> thousand זֹ֗את <S%H2063><s%> unto הֵשִׁ֤יבוּ <S%H7725><s%> pay לוֹ֙ בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> afflicted עַמּ֔וֹן <S%H5983><s%> Ammon ס וּבַשָּׁנָ֥ה <S%H8141><s%> year הַשֵּׁנִ֖ית <S%H8145><s%> him both the second וְהַשְּׁלִשִֽׁית׃ <S%H7992><s%> and the third

וַיִּתְחַזֵּ֖ק <S%H2388><s%> became mighty יוֹתָ֑ם <S%H3147><s%> So Jotham כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> because הֵכִ֣ין <S%H3559><s%> because he prepared דְּרָכָ֔יו <S%H1870><s%> his ways לִפְנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3069><s%> God אֱלֹהָֽיו׃ <S%H430><s%> his God

וְיֶתֶר֙ <S%H3499><s%> Now the rest דִּבְרֵ֣י <S%H1697><s%> of the acts יוֹתָ֔ם <S%H3147><s%> of Jotham וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all מִלְחֲמֹתָ֖יו <S%H4421><s%> and all his wars וּדְרָכָ֑יו <S%H1870><s%> and his ways הִנָּ֣ם <S%H2005><s%> behold כְּתוּבִ֔ים <S%H3789><s%> lo they [are] written עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> in סֵ֥פֶר <S%H5612><s%> in the book מַלְכֵֽי־ <S%H4428><s%> of the kings יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וִיהוּדָֽה׃ <S%H3063><s%> and Judah

בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> old עֶשְׂרִ֧ים <S%H6242><s%> and twenty וְחָמֵ֛שׁ <S%H2568><s%> He was five שָׁנָ֖ה <S%H8141><s%> years הָיָ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> become בְמָלְכ֑וֹ <S%H4427><s%> when he began to reign וְשֵׁשׁ־ <S%H8337><s%> six עֶשְׂרֵ֣ה <S%H6240><s%> teen שָׁנָ֔ה <S%H8141><s%> years מָלַ֖ךְ <S%H4427><s%> and reigned בִּירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> in Jerusalem

וַיִּשְׁכַּ֤ב <S%H7901><s%> slept יוֹתָם֙ <S%H3147><s%> And Jotham עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with אֲבֹתָ֔יו <S%H1><s%> with his fathers וַיִּקְבְּר֥וּ <S%H6912><s%> and they buried אֹת֖וֹ <S%H853><s%> בְּעִ֣יר <S%H5892><s%> him in the city דָּוִ֑יד <S%H1732><s%> of David וַיִּמְלֹ֛ךְ <S%H4427><s%> reigned אָחָ֥ז <S%H271><s%> and Ahaz בְּנ֖וֹ <S%H1121><s%> his son תַּחְתָּֽיו׃ <S%H8478><s%> his place פ
